mdRecord.dcterms:description: Students going over plans in the studio

Original design 1969-1972 by Pietro Belluschi and by Kenneth DeMay of Sasaki, Dawson, DeMay; Rawlings and Wilson, architects of record. East addition 2009 by WG Clark Associates; south addition 2009 by William Sherman Associates; landscape plan 2009 by Warren Byrd. -- Wilson/Neuman/Butler, University of Virginia campus guide, 2012. [work]
